name: Squid Life
description:
SQUID LIFE!

Not really a game, just a little test that turned into a fun little baby making simulator. You are Papa Squid (white) and live with Mama Squid (red). Your job is to impregnate her and insure that your genes are passed on to future generations.

Shift = Shoot eggs

Left & Right = Rotate

Up = Thrust forward

R = Restart
